elements.facilitator:
Acomb is a leading provider of business management software. The company recently upgraded its most popular product: a client management solution that lets people manage scheduling, inventories, billing, and more. Unfortunately, this upgrade creates problems for sales representatives, who not only need to understand the product’s technical capabilities – but communicate them to clients.

Acomb has hired an instructional design firm to train its sales staff. Click Next to see how they handle this project.

rubric.content:
You just learned about the five stages of the ADDIE model. Now, let’s see how this model might be used on an instructional design project.

Press the Play button to begin.

timelineObject.text: Who: leading provider of business management software
Background: recent upgrade of popular client management software product
Click Next to see the ADDIE model in action.
